verses.name: Jeremiah 4:17
verses.text: As keepers of a field, are they against her round about; because she hath been rebellious against me, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:18
verses.text: Thy way and thy doings have procured these things unto thee; this is thy wickedness, because it is bitter, because it reacheth unto thine heart.

verses.name: Jeremiah 4:19
verses.text: My bowels, my bowels! I am pained at my very heart; my heart maketh a noise in me; I cannot hold my peace, because thou hast heard, O my soul, the sound of the trumpet, the alarm of war.
